summary: Recent Information Technology graduate seeking an entry-level IT role at Accenture Philippines. Skilled in web development, programming, and database management. Experienced in internship projects with a focus on software testing, automation, and collaboration with agile teams.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

responsibilities: Conducted software testing and reported system bugs
Developed and maintained basic automation scripts
Assisted QA team with documentation and defect tracking
Collaborated with developers and testers in agile sprints

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: Built a responsive GitHub Pages portfolio to showcase projects, education, and technical skills.

projects.name: Student Information System (Capstone Project)
